coreAttributes.name: Flex Tape - Penis
coreAttributes.description: FLEX TAPE is a super strong, rubberized, waterproof tape that can patch, bond, seal and repair virtually anything, even your virginity! It is specially formulated with a thick, flexible, rubberized backing that conforms to any shape or object. This durable adhesive tape instantly seals out water, air and cum to create a super strong, flexible, watertight barrier.

displacementText.playerSelf: You very, very, VERY slowly peel the tape off your [pc.cock+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPC: You very, very slowly peel the tape off [npc.name]'s [npc.cock+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pinch a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before using your magic tear the tape on either side of [npc.name]'s [npc.cock+]. [npc.Name] can remove the rest [npc.herHim]self later. Not your problem.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] very, very, VERY slowly peels the tape off [npc.her] [npc.cock+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off your [pc.cock+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving your [pc.cock+] banded up and sore. That's a lotta damage!
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off [npc2.name]'s [npc2.cock+] and throws is away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving [npc2.name]'s [pc.cock+] banded and sore. That's a lotta damage!

replacementText.playerSelf: #IF (!pc.isPenisVirgin()) #THEN #IF (pc.setPenisVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You lift your [pc.cock+] up with one hand, and tape it down to your belly with two strips of Flex Tape. You then pap some squares on your balls for decoration. #ELSE You lift your [pc.cock+] up with one hand, and tape it down to your belly with two strips of Flex Tape. You then pap some squares on your balls for decoration. #ENDIF #ELSE You lift your [pc.cock+] up with one hand, and tape it down to your belly with two strips of Flex Tape. You then pap some squares on your balls for decoration. #ENDIF

You then pap some squares on [nps.herHis] balls for decoration. #ELSE You lift [npc.name]'s [npc.cock+] up with one hand, and tape it down to [npc.herHis] belly with two strips of Flex Tape. You then pap some squares on [nps.herHis] balls for decoration. #ENDIF
